descriptionHtml:
Oversizes Novelty Blowup Sword

Verison 1.0 by Maniczombie @ SkyrimNexus.com

This file replaces the model for the Iron Claymore with the Oversizes Novelty Blowup Sword.
Had a little bit of a problem when i was testing out a model export.. I just had to share it =)

How to Install:

Place the meshes folder inside C:\\ProgramFiles(x86)\\Steam\\steamapps\\common\\skyrim\\Data

Open Data files and select Load Loose Files.

Run the game.
author: Maniczombie
